tasks.task: Making a cooling herbal body and facial spray using fresh herbs
subtasks: Growing herbs, flowers, and weeds in garden
Filling a deep pot with distilled water and herbs
Inverting a clear lid over the herbs and water
Sterilizing containers and equipment with rubbing alcohol
Adding ice to a separate container
Setting up a container to catch steam
Turning on heat to simmer water and release steam
Monitoring the distillation process and adding more water as needed
Storing hydrosol in a sterile container
Asking viewers to like, comment, subscribe, and stay tuned
